item.title: CyberArk shares can rally more than 20% as identity security market evolves, BofA says
item.description: The firm raised its price target to $500.

item.title: Jefferies upgrades this beaten-down chip stock, says earnings are poised to rebound
item.description: The firm upgraded its rating to buy from hold.

item.description: Meta Platforms, Intel and Amazon are three stocks with interesting technical charts highlighted by Jessica Inskip of StockBrokers.com.

item.title: Tariffs, immigration and DOGE: What companies are saying about the impact of Trump policies on business
item.description: See how companies are responding to the major themes of Trump's campaign and early days in office.

item.title: Bank of America likes these income-generating assets, and some have coupons of more than 7%
item.description: Preferred securities combine aspects of equities and bonds, and the right offerings can offer attractive tax-advantaged income.
